name: Magic Johnson
description: 6'9" point guard, revolutionized the position. 5 championships, 3 MVPs. Showtime Lakers, million-dollar smile, made everyone better.

no-look-pass.name: No-Look Pass
no-look-pass.description: Signature no-look pass - eyes one way, ball another
no-look-pass.prompt: delivering no-look pass - head and eyes facing one direction, ball leaving hands toward completely different direction, big smile, running Showtime, making the impossible look easy

baby-hook.name: Junior Sky Hook
baby-hook.description: Learned from Kareem - his own version of the sky hook
baby-hook.prompt: shooting baby hook shot in traffic - arm extended high releasing soft hook, taller defenders unable to contest, the shot he learned from Kareem, Finals MVP moment
baby-hook.energy: clutch adaptation, learning from the best

full-speed-fastbreak.name: Showtime Break
full-speed-fastbreak.description: Leading the fast break, ball on a string
full-speed-fastbreak.prompt: racing up court leading fast break - ball on fingertips, eyes scanning for teammates, long strides covering ground, smile showing pure joy, Showtime Lakers in full flight

jumping-celebration.name: Leaping Celebration
jumping-celebration.description: Jumping into teammates' arms after big moment
jumping-celebration.prompt: leaping in celebration into teammate's arms - arms raised, huge smile, pure joy, championship moment, the ultimate team player celebrating with his brothers

million-dollar-smile.name: The Smile
million-dollar-smile.description: The famous Magic smile that lit up arenas
million-dollar-smile.prompt: standing with famous million-dollar smile - radiant, charismatic, arms perhaps spread welcoming, the smile that made everyone love basketball, pure positive energy

pointing-to-teammate.name: Crediting Teammate
pointing-to-teammate.description: Pointing to the teammate who scored off his pass
pointing-to-teammate.prompt: pointing to teammate after assist - deflecting credit, smile of genuine joy at teammate's success, the ultimate point guard celebrating others, team-first mentality
